action.action-desc: Mr. Latta introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To eliminate automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Vote, No Raise Act.

section.header: Elimination of automatic pay adjustments for Members of Congress

subsection.text: Paragraph (2) of section 601(a) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 (2 U.S.C. 4501(2)) is repealed.
Section 601(a)(1) of such Act (2 U.S.C. 4501) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by redesignating subparagraphs (A), (B), and (C) as paragraphs (1), (2), and (3), respectively; and
by striking , as adjusted by paragraph (2) of this subsection.

section.text: This Act and the amendments made by this Act shall take effect on December 31, 2024.
